get.summary: Display the app constants

name.description: Unique name for the permission, used for looking up permission information in the application layer.

display_name.description: Human readable name for the permission.

description.description: A more detailed explanation of the Permission.

display_name.description: Human readable name for the Role. Not necessarily unique and optional.

description.description: A more detailed explanation of what the Role does. Also optional.

passport-swaggervel_auth.description: OAuth2 grant provided by Laravel Passport
